file_content.text: [This terminal is offline.]
The doors are sealed. That creature won't be getting out anytime soon.
You actually pulled it off? That's a huge relief.
With that monster locked down, we'll have a much better shot at getting things under control. Thank you.
No problem.
There's no telling how many lives you saved. That monster would've torn our people apart.
I've had way tougher tasks.
Then I guess we were lucky you were around to help.
That's everything, right?
I couldn't ask you for anything more.
Stay safe down there.
You again? Either get those doors welded, or get out of there before it's too late!
What the...? I thought Devlin and his men were all gone from that section! You need to get out of there!
Something very big and very nasty is tearing its way out of one of the holding vaults! You need to start running, understand?
Can we stop this thing?
You could try to seal the blasted thing in, if you're crazy enough.
I can handle myself.
Don't tell me what to do.
Is that supposed to scare me?
If you're going to stay down there, you'd better do something to keep that beast from getting out.
Grab a welding torch from one of our droids' supply drops. You can use that to seal up the doors to the creature's cell.
You can grab some welding torches from one of our droids' supply drops and use them to seal the doors to the creature's cell.
Welding the doors should keep the thing contained until we can get the situation back under control. Otherwise, that blasted monster will kill everything it lays eyes on.
Got it.
You really are crazy. Good luck to you.
No sweat.
Just watch yourself--that monster isn't the only thing that's dangerous down there.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Then do yourself a favor and get out of there while you can.
[This terminal is offline.]
You're alive? What about that monster...?
I'm not seeing any indications that its cell was sealed properly. You actually killed that thing...?
Ha! Maybe we can bring things under control after all. Thank you.
Maybe a reward is in order?
After that? I'll see what I can do.
